languages.text: {n}Хор истошных воплей дворян не может заглушить злой шепот сержанта:{/n} "Хватит. Ты свое отговорил".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хор истошных воплей, рвущихся из глоток дворян, не способен заглушить злой шепот сержанта.{/n} "Хватит. Ты свое отговорил".

languages.text: {n}The chorus of the nobles' screams cannot drown out the sergeant's spiteful whisper:{/n} "Enough. You've said your piece."
languages.original_text: {n}Хор истошных воплей дворян не может заглушить злой шепот сержанта:{/n} "Хватит. Ты свое отговорил".

languages.text: {n}Der Chor der Schreie der Adligen kann das hasserfüllte Flüstern des Sergeants nicht übertönen:{/n} "Genug. Ihr habt gesagt, was Ihr sagen wolltet."
languages.original_text: {n}The chorus of the nobles' screams cannot drown out the sergeant's spiteful whisper:{/n} "Enough. You've said your piece."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Chor der Schreie der Adligen kann das hasserfüllte Flüstern des Sergeants nicht übertönen:{/n} "Genug. Ihr habt gesagt, was Ihr sagen wolltet."

languages.text: {n}Les hurlements des nobles ne parviennent pas à masquer le murmure sardonique du sergent :{/n} « Mauvaise réponse. »
languages.original_text: {n}The chorus of the nobles' screams cannot drown out the sergeant's spiteful whisper:{/n} "Enough. You've said your piece."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les hurlements des nobles ne parviennent pas à masquer le murmure sardonique du sergent :{/n} « Mauvaise réponse. »

languages.text: {n}那些贵族齐声尖叫起来，但却无法盖过军士怨毒的低语。{/n}“够了，你已经没什么可说的了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The chorus of the nobles' screams cannot drown out the sergeant's spiteful whisper:{/n} "Enough. You've said your piece."

traits.locale_text: {n}那些贵族齐声尖叫起来，但却无法盖过军士怨毒的低语。{/n}“够了，你已经没什么可说的了。”

languages.text: {n}貴族たちの悲鳴の大合唱も、軍曹の苦々しげな囁きをかき消すことはできない。{/n}「もういい。言いたいことは言っただろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The chorus of the nobles' screams cannot drown out the sergeant's spiteful whisper:{/n} "Enough. You've said your piece."

traits.locale_text: {n}貴族たちの悲鳴の大合唱も、軍曹の苦々しげな囁きをかき消すことはできない。{/n}「もういい。言いたいことは言っただろう」

languages.text: {n}El coro de gritos de los nobles no puede ahogar el susurro rencoroso del sargento:{/n} «Basta. Ya ha dicho lo que tenía que decir».
languages.original_text: {n}The chorus of the nobles' screams cannot drown out the sergeant's spiteful whisper:{/n} "Enough. You've said your piece."

traits.locale_text: {n}El coro de gritos de los nobles no puede ahogar el susurro rencoroso del sargento:{/n} «Basta. Ya ha dicho lo que tenía que decir».

languages.text: {n}Soyluların hep bir ağızdan attığı çığlıklar bile çavuşun kin dolu fısıltısını bastıramıyor.{/n} "Yeter. Diyeceğini dedin."
languages.original_text: {n}The chorus of the nobles' screams cannot drown out the sergeant's spiteful whisper:{/n} "Enough. You've said your piece."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soyluların hep bir ağızdan attığı çığlıklar bile çavuşun kin dolu fısıltısını bastıramıyor.{/n} "Yeter. Söyleyeceğini söyledin."
